normalised: Arrey yaar, I-R-C-T-C is showing the train from Mumbai to Goa is scheduled to depart at sixteen thirty hours on twenty second December two thousand and twenty four, but knowing Indian Railways, I'm preponing my arrival at the station by at least three hours! Better to be early than spend Christmas Eve stranded, am I right? Plus, gotta factor in the chai and vada pav breaks, which are always thirty minutes minimum, each.
